ul_42307: #!/bin/sh
echo 1 > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward
INET="wlan0"
INETIP="$(ifconfig $INET | sed -n '/inet addr/{s/.*addr://;s/ .*//;p}')"
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o $INET -j SNAT --to-source $INETIP
